title: North Esports Recruitment Challenge! - We are looking for PLAYERS!

embed.description: North Esports is very proud to present our very first RECRUITMENT CHALLENGE! Thankyou all for the support you have given us since we launched 3 days ago and we look forward to the response!

body:
North Esports is a BRAND NEW Australian Esports organisation that is looking for players, staff and editors to join us. We are ALREADY SPONSORED too! If you want to join us or are interested, please head to our youtube recruitment challenge and twitter to check us out! 

Subscribe to our Youtube and Follow our social media for more! 

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JN5e5Esdbx4
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/northesportsne
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NorthEsportsNE
